maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: ...Привет!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: ...Whoa!\. You spoke!\. Is your voice finally back?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: ...Ого!\. Ты заговорила!\. Твой голос наконец вернулся?
...Привет...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: ...Wait, that ain't right.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: ...Подожди, что-то не так.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Her speech synchronization is still malfunctioning.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Её синхронизация речи по-прежнему работает неисправно.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: I just hard-coded the word "Hi" into her speech module.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Я просто закодировал слово "Привет" в её речевой модуль.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: That is all she can say for now.\. I am currently working on adding more words.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Это всё, что она сейчас может сказать.\. В данный момент я работаю над добавлением большего количества слов.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: I see... It's a start, I s'pose.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Понятно... Полагаю, начало положено.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Anyway, the Cap and I here have been planning out your combat training, girl.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: В общем, подруга, мы тут с кэпом планируем твою боевую тренировку.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: We're almost set and good to go, right?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Мы уже почти готовы и скоро можно будет выдвигаться, верно?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Aye, this is gonna be interestin'.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Так точно, это будет интересно.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Well, I'm off to my cabin for some final preparations.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Ну, я пойду к себе в каюту для последних приготовлений.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: I'll be done in no time, so just stick with the captain, 'kay?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Это не займёт много времени, так что просто держись капитана, хорошо?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: See ya later!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Увидимся!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Aye, I'll be back on the bridge. Ye can talk to me when ye're ready for the lesson.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Ага, я вернусь на мостик. Поговори со мной, когда будешь готова к тренировке.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Make sure ye're prepared.\. I'll be expectin' yer full attention.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Убедись, что ты готова.\. Я ожидаю твоего полного внимания.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Ye two over there.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Эй, вы двое.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Make sure ye clean up the galley after ye're done cookin', understood?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Убедитесь, что камбуз вымыт, после того, как закончите готовку, поняли?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Aye, aye, captain!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Так точно, капитан!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: It's not like we forgot since the last time he told us.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Как будто мы могли забыть с прошлого раза, когда он нам это сказал.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.orig: Yeah, wasn't that yesterday?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/10.text: Ага, разве это было не вчера?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Intero?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Intero?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Привет!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Oh!!\. Miss Ava...\. I mean, Lea!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Ой!!\. Мисс Ава...\. в смысле, Лея!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: You're back on the ship, that's great!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Ты вернулась на корабль, здорово!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: I also saw that other avatar on the ship, today!\. A Pentafist, so cool!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Я сегодня видел на корабле ещё одного аватара!\. Пентафист, так круто!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: But you know what the greatest news is?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Но знаешь, что лучше всего?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: What?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Что?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Soon, I can finally play \c[3]CrossWorlds myself\c[0]!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Скоро я смогу \c[3]сам играть в CrossWorlds\c[0]!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: I'll be on vacation in a couple weeks, I saved up all the money for the hardware and subscription...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Через пару недель у меня будет отпуск, я скопил все деньги на оборудование и подписку...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Nothing can stop me, now!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Теперь меня ничто не остановит!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Once I'm in the game, I'll make sure to say hello!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Когда я буду в игре, я обязательно поздороваюсь!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Hi!
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Привет!

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Oh hey...\. you're back on our ship?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: О, привет...\. ты вернулась на наш корабль?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: It's been a while, hasn't it?
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Прошло много времени, не так ли?

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: [кивает]

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: We're currently busy as ever...\. Instatainment has big plans.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Мы как всегда заняты...\. у Instatainment большие планы.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Meanwhile, my geeky colleague will soon have his first long vacation in a while.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: А у моего коллеги-гика скоро первый отпуск за долгое время.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Not sure if he'd already told you what he plans to do...
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Не знаю, рассказал ли он тебе уже о своих планах...

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: You know...\. most people would just try to visit a nice place or something.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Знаешь...\. большинство людей просто поехали бы в какое-нибудь красивое место.

maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.orig: Not that guy.
maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json/entities/13.text: Но не этот парень.
